scripts.build: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config apps/node-host/webpack.config.js --output-path apps/node-host/dist --mode production
scripts.build:development: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config apps/node-host/webpack.config.js --output-path apps/node-host/dist --mode development
scripts.build:production: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec webpack-cli --config apps/node-host/webpack.config.js --output-path apps/node-host/dist --mode production
scripts.serve: pnpm --filter node-host run build:development && node apps/node-host/dist/main.js
scripts.serve:development: pnpm --filter node-host run build:development && node apps/node-host/dist/main.js
scripts.serve:production: pnpm --filter node-host run build:production && node apps/node-host/dist/main.js
